name: Lux Somnium
description:
Long ago, a legend told of a creature called the Devoratrix. If you found yourself face to face with this creature in your dreams, you would be devoured. Only the light can destroy the Devoratrix and save you from this nightmare.

Using a flashlight to light your way, fight through the Devoratrix each time it appears in this 2D side-scroller!

Lux Somnium was created for the Cursed Image Jam as one of our team member's first solo game! The cursed image that was used for this game was the cat with a doll mask, and appears throughout as the enemy.
